title: ICE when matching an enum with a struct pattern of the same name

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
enum Foo {
    Bar(int)
}

fn main() {
    match Bar(1i) {
        Foo { i } => ()
    }
}
```

```
<anon>:7:9: 7:18 error: mismatched types: expected `Foo`, found `Foo` [E0028]
<anon>:7         Foo { i } => ()
                 ^~~~~~~~~
error: internal compiler error: no type for node 19: local i (id=19) in fcx 0x7f9f78bf1c20
```
